name: Click Critters - More readable font
description:
A small modification for those who find the current CC font hard to read without zooming.
Its doesn't alter any images or stylings besides the font, so it'll match any layout without problems. :)
additional_info:
A small modification for those who find the current CC font hard to read without zooming.
Its doesn't alter any images or stylings besides the font, so it'll match any layout without problems. :)

It's changed to Verdana at a slightly bigger size than the site's Arial font, so I personally find it easier to read. You're more than free to alter that though, if there's other fonts you might prefer.
